channel.title: Comedy on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Comedy on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: My First Live S.E.X. Show
item.description: A couple months ago my friends Karen Rayne and Heather Ross approached me with an idea. I don’t remember the wording, but I don’t think it was anything less tongue-in-cheek than “Wanna do a sex show in Austin?” Um. Yes.
